@human_name.description: Human readable name of the application

app.name: matrix-authentication-service

@technical_description.description: Introduction text displayed on the home page

privacy_policy.alt: Link to the service privacy policy

terms_and_conditions.alt: Link to the service terms and conditions

@unexpected.description: Error message displayed when an unexpected error occurs

add_email.description: Enter an email address to recover your account in case you lose access to it.

@heading.description: Heading for the page to add an email address

captcha.noscript: This form is protected by a CAPTCHA and requires JavaScript to be enabled to submit it. Please enable JavaScript in your browser and reload this page.

@change.description: Button to change the user's password

@confirm.description: Confirmation field for the new password

@current.description: Field for the user's current password

change_password.description: This will change the password on your account.
change_password.heading: Change my password

@heading.description: Heading on the change password page

@new.description: Field for the user's new password

consent.client_wants_access: %(client_name)s at %(redirect_uri)s wants to acccess your account.
consent.heading: Allow access to your account?
consent.you_may_be_sharing: You may be sharing sensitive information with this site or app.

device_code_link.headline: Enter the code displayed on your device

device_consent.another_device_access: Another device wants to access your account.

denied.description: You denied access to %(client_name)s. You can close this window.
denied.heading: Access denied

granted.description: You granted access to %(client_name)s. You can close this window.
granted.heading: Access granted

@greeting.description: Greeting at the top of emails sent to the user

recovery.click_button: Click on the button below to create a new password:
recovery.copy_link: Copy the following link and paste it into a browser to create a new password:
recovery.headline: You requested a password reset for your %(server_name)s account.
recovery.subject: Reset your account password (%(mxid)s)
recovery.you_can_ignore: If you didn't ask for a new password, you can ignore this email. Your current password will continue to work.

verify.body_html: Your verification code to confirm this email address is: %(code)s

@body_html.description: The body of the email sent to verify an email address (HTML)

verify.body_text: Your verification code to confirm this email address is: %(code)s

@body_text.description: The body of the email sent to verify an email address (text)

verify.subject: Your email verification code is: %(code)s

@subject.description: The subject line of the email sent to verify an email address

errors.captcha: CAPTCHA verification failed, please try again
errors.rate_limit_exceeded: You've made too many requests in a short period. Please wait a few minutes and try again.

@continue_with_provider.description: Button to log in with an upstream provider

@forgot_password.description: On the login page, link to the account recovery process

not_found.description: The page you were looking for doesn't exist or has been moved
not_found.heading: Page not found

@not_you.description: Suggestions for the user to log in as a different user

policy_violation.description: This might be because of the client which authored the request, the currently logged in user, or the request itself.

policy_violation.heading: The authorization request was denied the policy enforced by this service

@heading.description: Displayed when an authorization request is denied by the policy

consumed.description: To create a new password, start over and select “Forgot password”.

disabled.description: If you have lost your credentials, please contact the administrator to recover your account.

expired.description: Request a new email that will be sent to: %(email)s.

@confirm.description: Label for the password confirmation field

finish.description: Choose a new password for your account.
